info.name: Lunar Missle
info.description: The construction for my custom Lunar Missle spell for the Isilmnir’el subrace.
info.author: Gustavo Schip

description.p: You hurl a moonmote at a target, dealing 1d4 radiant damage. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, depending on the current phase of the moon, the following effect happens.

tr.td: The target is slowed for 1 turn, and takes 1d4 additional cold damage.
The target is pushed 15 feet away from you.
The target takes 1d4 additional radiant damage, this additional damage is doubled against Undead targets.
The target is blinded for 1 turn.

description.p: This spell’s damage increases by 1d4 when you reach 5th level (2d4), 11th level (3d4), and 17th level (4d4).
